name: Picture Cross Towns
description:
Solve picross / nonogram style puzzles, and watch them transform into a blossoming little town scene!

Just a quick little prototype to try out an idea. Let me know in the comments if you think it works and would like to see more.

Instructions:

  1. Click to fill / unfill tiles
  2. Numbers next to rows / columns = number of tiles to fill
  3. Multiple numbers = there are multiple segments of filled tiles
  4. There is always at least 1 empty tile between filled segments
  5. Optional: right-click to mark tiles as empty (useful for big puzzles)
  6. No need to guess, all puzzles can be solved with logic :)
  7. Good luck and hope you have fun!
